name: Alpha-Lipoic Acid (ALA)

dosage.notes: R-form (R-ALA) is the bioactive isomer. Take on empty stomach.

keyFindings: Universal antioxidant — works in both aqueous and lipid environments
Recycles other antioxidants (vitamins C, E, glutathione)
description: Universal antioxidant — works in both aqueous and lipid environments
